content: Um... is it weird that I like such an unassuming flower as the Three-Leaf Clover?
If you don't mind, I'd love to give you this <color=#599d63>"Three-Leaf Clover Wreath"</color> I made as a welcome gift~
Oh! Thank you~ I really love these Three-Leaf Clovers you picked!
Don't worry about it! You'll find other lovely plants as you explore around. See you later~
Mm! Though they're just common grass that grows everywhere here, they're beautiful despite being humble - just like Huyou Valley. I really love them, but...
